definition: sudden and violent attack/assault/fig. rushed job/concentrated effort to finish a job quickly
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]
sudden attack from the opposite direction (idiom)
kamikaze unit (Japanese corps of suicide pilots in World War II)
sudden unannounced investigation/on-the-spot inspection/to search without notification

sentences.english: Commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.chinese: 突击队和空降部队在被占领的桥梁附近汇合。

sentences.english: The commandos blackened their faces with charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 那名突击队员用木炭把他的脸涂黑。

sentences.english: The landings called for an assault on a five-divisional front.
sentences.chinese: 登陆要求在五条分割的战线上进行突击。

sentences.english: My teachers say it is best to study a little each night and not try to swat-up right before the exams.
sentences.chinese: 老师说最好每个晚上学习一会儿，不要在考试前突击。

sentences.english: Support players will deplete ammunition quickly, and will need the rifleman class to resupply them.
sentences.chinese: 支援兵的弹药消耗很快，需要突击兵来补给他们。

sentences.english: Chen Tianfang see the situation is critical, led by the Cang wolf commandos launched rescue operations.
sentences.chinese: 陈天放眼见形势危急，率领苍狼突击队展开营救行动。

sentences.english: They say he used a military-style assault rifle to carry out the shooting spree.
sentences.chinese: 他们称，他使用一支军用突击步枪实施了此次枪击案。

sentences.english: The commando blackened his face with charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 那名突击队员用木炭把他的脸涂黑。

sentences.english: It is the primary "heavy" gun carried by SEALs on patrol.
sentences.chinese: 它是海豹突击队在巡逻时主要使用的重型武器。

sentences.english: I got shot six times with a 762 assault rifle and I'm still alive.
sentences.chinese: 我六次被762突击步枪击中，但我现在还活着。

sentences.english: The commandos attacked the outpost at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 突击队员于拂晓时袭击了前哨基地。

sentences.english: North Korean commandos are not expected to survive such attacks.
sentences.chinese: 此类攻击后，北朝鲜突击队预计不会有人活着。

sentences.english: They were almost all shock workers.
The Raider Buggy is the 2nd fastest class of vehicle in the game.
sentences.chinese: 突击车是游戏里第二快速的陆军载具。

sentences.english: These assault tanks form the frontline of Trade Federation armored infantry divisions.
sentences.chinese: 这种突击坦克形成贸易联盟装甲步兵师的前线。

sentences.english: The basic skill of using assault to close near a monster , replace running to move.
sentences.chinese: 使用突击代替走位快速接近敌人的基本技巧。

definition: to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
